full_address: Unit 14/1 Ormonde Terrace, Kings Beach, Qld 4551
description:
Unique opportunity to purchase your own "Bluechip" Kings Beach apartment!

Absolute waterfront and with Kings Beach on your doorstep, this distinctive 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom, 1-car accommodation (with storage) apartment, located in the highly sought-after Casablanca Resort allows you the opportunity to kick back and enjoy beachside living!

Embracing stunning coastal and ocean views over Kings Beach, Kings Beach Parklands, and the Brisbane Shipping Channel, this fully furnished 2nd floor apartment leaves no stone unturned. Generous in size and well laid out, this property can easily be called home, used as an investment opportunity or equally as the family weekender.

Situated in an idyllic location and never to be built out, this home offers unique coastal lifestyle appeal. Internally, the apartment presents with plantation shutters and security screens to most windows, several split system air conditioning units throughout and the piece de resistance is a spacious and fully functional kitchen where quality appliances, ample cabinetry and cupboard space, with the abundance of natural light.

Both the dining and living areas have been designed to seamlessly connect to a sun-drenched balcony which enjoys a glorious vista over Kings Beach. Adjoining the living space there is a spacious study area where working from home could never be easier.

The master bedroom is private, has built in robes, ceiling fan, two-way bathroom and a split system air conditioning unit. The guest bedroom is also impressive with built-in robes, split system air conditioning unit, size, privacy, and layout.

This apartment promises a prestigious lifestyle and is just footsteps from the surf, boardwalk, restaurants, Amphitheatre, all the conveniences of downtown Kings Beach and public transport is at your doorstep.

Site
• Just moments to the surf and sand
• Bluechip Kings Beach Location
• Leave the car at home
• Stone's throw to world renowned Kings Beach
• Minutes to Happy Valley and Bulcock Beach
• In-ground heated swimming pool (with sail shade cover), BBQ area & manicured gardens
• Tennis Court and Half Basketball Court to rear
• Secure undercover single car parking space (with additional storage)
• On site manager

Residence
• Split system air conditioning throughout
• Fully furnished
• Well laid out
• Generous outdoor balcony with glorious views over Kings Beach and Parklands
• Functional and well-maintained kitchen, quality appliances and ample cabinetry and cupboard space
• Master bedroom comes complete with built in robes, ceiling fan and air conditioning
• Generous sized guest bedroom
• Two-way bathroom
• Independent Laundry
• Independent Toilet
• Plantation Shutters to most windows
• Vinyl timber floors throughout
• NBN ready

Facilities
• Adjacent to Kings Beach and Boardwalk
• Boating, fishing and water sports on your doorstep
• Close to Caloundra Golf Club, educations hubs, public transport and downtown Caloundra
• *An hour's drive to Brisbane and both the Domestic and International Airports
• Perfectly located, * an hour's drive from Brisbane and Noosa, and *30 minutes from both coastal and hinterland hotspots including Mooloolaba, Maroochydore, the Sunshine Coast Airport and Glass House Mountains.
• Close to the Sunshine Coast Hospital and University Precincts

*Approximately

This apartment will not last long - Call Natascha 0410 081 970 or Carola 0417 608 466 today to arrange an inspection!
